subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: A year ago, Tyson Gay was on top of the sprinting world, but a lot changes in a year, including the hamstring injury that struck while Gay was trying to qualify for the Olympics in July.
snippet: A year ago, Tyson Gay was on top of the sprinting world, but a lot changes in a year, including the hamstring injury that struck while Gay was trying to qualify for the Olympics in July.
